author: mgodden
title: Chilling photo shows rapist playing with kids at birthday party where girl, 3, was snatched and killed… but he DENIES abducting her
text:
Opinion 'HE IS A MONSTER' Chilling photo shows rapist playing with kids at birthday party where girl, 3, was snatched and killed… but he DENIES abducting her 
Vladica Rajkovic admitted to raping and murdering a woman but denied doing the same to three-year-old Angelina who is pictured crouching down in front of him By DIONA MARTIN
